Title: Allow users to create events

Description:
Enable users to create new activities/events from the web interface. The form should allow users to specify the event name, description, type, location, date/time, and maximum participants. New events should appear in the activities list and on the map.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Users can create events via a form
- Events include name, description, type, location, date/time, max participants
- New events are visible to all users
- Events are shown on the map
